trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Stanford
There were no other sightings in Stanford on or around August 10th 2008
Summary: It was a star like object, circle, alternated between red and white light
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to just take a look around. My dog was barking. She was facing the field across from my house. I looked around and then noticed the ufo. It was "dancing". I moved left right up down in circles, in a looping J shaps. The lights kept flashing from red to white. It looked like a large star, slightly larger than any star in the sky, larger than Jupitor appears. I was feeling quite happy watching this thing "dance" i the sky. At one point it seemed the object wss beginning to move closer to me. I became a bit frightened. It then retreated to its former distance. I watched it for five minutes. It was located low on the horizon, just above the tree tops behind the field. I then went in the house to see if my daughter was still awake so she could enjoy the sight. She was already in bed. I went back outside and looked to the Southeast, the direction where I observed it. It was gone. Then I looked around the night sky and saw it or another similar object higher in the sky in the western sky. It was farther away, or perhaps was a smaller object.I watched it for approximately 5 minutes and then returned to my studio to paint. A bit later I went outside to look for it again but it was gone.
